overview: A Sumatran elephant calf is being hunted for smuggling. This incident caught the attention of five children who were camping nearby. Tensions rise when elephant hunters target the five children. In the dense forest, they have to self-report by car. When they arrived in the city, they secretly took the Sumatran elephant calf into the freight train. The five children had the courage to save the Sumatran elephant calf from the elephant hunters.
title: Para Pemburu Gajah
